title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
created_time: June 07, 2022, 03:25:11 PMLast edit: March 19, 2023, 11:45:08 AM by Gianluca95
content: Hi guys,As subject says, I'm looking currently for a Job.I can work as translator for italian-english and viceversa language.I've a big experience as Campaign manager, below there is a list of campaign that I've managed:Campaign that I've managed (The ones that I remember now):- Betcoin.TM twitter campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1286719.0- Betcoin.TM signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1303729.0- HumanResources signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1305655.0- BTC2BID.com Signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1413351.0- Sportsbet.io signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1459293.msg14739534#msg14739534- [banned mixer] Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1441572.msg14583902#msg14583902- Satoshigames.io Signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1570898.msg15768786#msg15768786- Betking.io Signature campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1472343.msg14847375#msg14847375- BCH.Games Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404782.msg60485580#msg60485580- Wintomato Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404652.msg60478345#msg60478345- GXGBet Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403778.msg60425343#msg60425343- Shaker.finance Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405797.msg60545027#msg60545027- Starbets.io Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406013.msg60555781#msg60555781- Yas.bet Signature Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5407578.msg60627148#msg60627148Promotion that I've managed:- Betking.io Tipster Promotion: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1470594.msg14830979#msg14830979- Sportsbet.io Tipster Challenge: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1419837.msg14375173#msg14375173- E-coin.io Credit Cards Promotion: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1413317.msg14323679#msg14323679 (now Wirex)I can also work as marketer and provide to you management of your activity such as; writing articles on medium and manage your company on reddit, twitter, ecc.Just contact me if you're interested please, I'm in need of work at the moment. Thanks everyone for the attention, and if you have question, just ask it below.

comments.author: crunck
comments.body: Interesting, It seems you was very good campaign manager at past, and stopped suddenly, interval period is really huge.Nowadays competition is higher than past.My suggestion for you, follow the other CM's ANN thread and look how they organized their ANN thread to attract the project owner.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.created_time: June 16, 2022, 07:19:25 AMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 07:54:29 AM by Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: crunck on June 16, 2022, 03:43:29 AMInteresting, It seems you was very good campaign manager at past, and stopped suddenly, interval period is really huge.Nowadays competition is higher than past.My suggestion for you, follow the other CM's ANN thread and look how they organized their ANN thread to attract the project owner.I've stopped because of a huge issues in my real life (lost my father), and, so decided to take a pause from bitcointalk.org.Now I'm back, and hope to do something. Thanks for your advice anyway. I'll do my best, hope to be hired by someone.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: I recommend this manager's service.Good luck Gianluca95

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: I appreciate this man. I joined Gianluca's signature campaign. And I can tell you with a 100% guarantee that you don't have to worry about payment. His service is also quite solid. I recommend this man to everyone.Â  . Good Luck Gianluca95

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Dude, remove Caps Lock, otherwise such text hurts everyone's eyes.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Thanks to everyone for your feedback.Quote from: icopress on July 01, 2022, 04:27:03 PMDude, remove Caps Lock, otherwise such text hurts everyone's eyes.Well, luckily it seems that the users that has contacted me hasn't complained about that; for this kind of advice, the next time please use PM
